title: Granting You a Dreamlike Life
overview: Based on the novel of the same name by Juzi Chen, presents a love story that transcends three lifetimes.A food critic, Lin Jing Yun who was born and bred in France, returns to her family home to find an old diary that chronicles a love story between a popular actress Tian Ying/Lin Ruomeng and the son of a triad leader, Luo Fu Sheng during 1930s Shanghai.
